title: AMD in 2018 - Ryzen 2, Threadripper 2 & MORE!
description: AMDs's 2018 roadmap has been unveiled.  We take a deep dive into everything from Ryzen 2 to Raven Ridge and Threadripper 2.  Our CES coverage is sponsored by PHANTEKS // CORSAIR // COOLER MASTER.   Subscribe    As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.  Gear list (buy from Amazon):  Panasonic GH5 -  Panasonic GH4 -  Panasonic G7 -  Canon C100 -  Sony RX100m3 -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #ces #ces2018 #2600x #2700x #ryzen32200g
